description: Operations on API keys associated with an Application Insights component.

commands.name: az monitor app-insights api-key create
commands.summary: Create an API Key of an Application Insights component.
examples: az monitor app-insights api-key create --api-key cli-demo --read-properties ReadTelemetry --write-properties WriteAnnotations -g demoRg --app testApp
az monitor app-insights api-key create --api-key cli-demo --read-properties '""' --write-properties '""' -g demoRg --app testApp

commands.name: az monitor app-insights api-key delete
commands.summary: Delete an API key from an Application Insights resource.
examples: az monitor app-insights api-key delete --app demoApp -g demoRg --api-key demo-key

commands.name: az monitor app-insights api-key show
commands.summary: Get all keys or a specific API key associated with an Application Insights resource.
examples: az monitor app-insights api-key show --app demoApp -g demoRg --api-key demo-key
az monitor app-insights api-key show --app demoApp -g demoRg
